product_name: Boreal Ookpik Kayak with Rudder - Special Buy
long_description: Equipped with a rudder for straight paddling, the Boreal Ookpik Kayak with Rudder is a highly stable recreational kayak you can load up with gear for day tours and short overnights. Large, comfortable cockpit offers excellent freedom of movement. Rotomolded polyethylene construction offers performance, rugged durability and affordability. Adjustable footbraces ensure a comfortable paddling position. Foot-pedal-controlled rudder system with cockpit deployment controls help you steer and track effectively. Bow and stern hatches features easy-to-use rubber covers that seal securely. Bungee rigging fore and aft of cockpit. 54 lb. weight. Special buy.
short_description: Equipped with a rudder for straight paddling, the Boreal Ookpik Kayak with Rudder is a highly stable recreational kayak you can load up with gear for day tours and short overnights.
